content: "Un ballo in maschera" - Libretto Overview (Condensed to 650 Characters)Act 1: In Sweden, Riccardo, the king, secretly loves Amelia, wife of his best friend Renato. Unbeknownst to Renato, Amelia is in love with Riccardo. Meanwhile, a conspiracy is brewing to assassinate Riccardo.Act 2: Amelia confesses her love for Riccardo, but Riccardo reassures her. Renato discovers the affair and vows revenge.Act 3: At the masked ball, Riccardo is shot by Renato. In his final moments, Riccardo forgives his friend. The opera ends with a tragic reconciliation.
